壼字的基本解释

壼字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kǔn］
［《廣韻》苦本切，上混，溪。］
“壸1”的繁体字。
(1)古时宫中道路。引申指内宫。亦泛指妇女居住的内室。
(2)广。

壼字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【士字部】　壼； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页244第01
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】?苦本切，音悃。【爾雅·釋宮】宮中衖謂之壼。【註】衖，閣道門。【詩·大雅】室家之壼。　又【正韻】音困。義同。

壸
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［kǔn］
["Guangyun" bitter original cut, upmix, creek. ]
Traditional characters for "壸1".
(1) The road in the palace in ancient times. The extension refers to the inner palace. It also refers to the inner room where women live.
(2) Wide.
壸
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Ugly Collection] [Shizi Department] 　壸; Kangxi strokes: 13; Page number: page 244 01
[Guangyun] [Jiyun] [Rhyme]? Hard to cut the original, the sound is terrible. 【Erya·Shigong】The palace in the palace is called the palace. [Note] 衖, the door of the pavilion. 【Poetry·Daya】The House of Shijia.　[Zheng Yun] sound sleepy. The same meaning.
